definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
no first use (policy for nuclear weapons)/NFU

sentences.english: Idealized research methods to solve the historiography of measurement was first crisis.
sentences.chinese: 理想化的研究方法首先解决了计量史学的危机。

sentences.english: But first, we need to know some terminology.
sentences.chinese: 不过，我们首先需要了解一些术语。

sentences.english: Should one renounce Nirvana oneself, in order to help others towards it first?
sentences.chinese: 人应该放弃自己的涅磐，为了首先帮助它人达到它？

sentences.english: We must first calculate the horse-power needed to propel the ship.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须首先计算出驱动这艘船需要多大马力。

sentences.english: When she came back, she did her summer exercise first.
sentences.chinese: 当她回到家中之后，她首先做了暑假作业。

sentences.english: Firstly, several current network topology configurations for EPON are presented.
sentences.chinese: 首先介绍了EPON的几种现有网络拓扑结构。

sentences.english: First of all, one should use Indian or Ceylonese tea.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你得用印度或者斯里兰卡茶。

sentences.english: There are two ways to solve supply and demand contradiction.
sentences.chinese: 解决供需矛盾可从两个方面着手，首先是减少需求。

sentences.english: In the first part, the author explain the meaning of medium-small investor.
sentences.chinese: 论文第一章首先阐述了投资者和中小投资者的内涵。

sentences.english: The author firstly reviews the historical evolution of WTO secretariat.
sentences.chinese: 笔者首先从历史的角度对秘书处做出了追根溯源。

sentences.english: Well, first of all, let's look at the Lewis structure.
sentences.chinese: 好，首先，我们看看它的路易斯结构。

sentences.english: First of all, I sing a song for country songs.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我为大家唱一首乡村歌曲。

sentences.english: First of all, it will only be a minute or two at a time, maybe once or twice a lecture.
sentences.chinese: 首先，每次只有一两分钟，一堂课最多不超过两次。

sentences.english: First, break up the main task into data- or functionally-independent subtasks.
sentences.chinese: 首先，将主任务分解为数据或功能独立的子任务。

sentences.english: First off, allow us to apologize for the abductions.
sentences.chinese: 首先，请容许咱们为绑票地球人而表达歉意。

sentences.english: First is concern over the implications of Summers' ouster for an incoming president.
sentences.chinese: 首先是对驱逐萨莫斯校长迎来新校长的担忧。

definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to be certain/to be positive/assuredly/definitely/to give recognition/to affirm/affirmative (answer)
